summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 11 and 12 of Block 1, 2 and 3, Washington Place Addition; Lots 5 and 6 of Blocks 23, 24 and 25, and Lots 4, 5 and 6 of Block 26B, Gamma Poncin's Addition; Lots 1 to 5 inclusive, 9 and 10, Richard's Addition; Tract 4, 5, 6, 8 to 14 inclusive, 19, 22, 24, 26 and 27, Sarah B. Yesler's Tracts (Unrec.); and Lot 10, Block 2, Leary Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-242 and 17-188, respectively.
